entry.title: Creating Personal Blog Using Github + Hexo
entry.content:
Intro

This is my first blog :)

In this article, I record my process of creating a personal blog using Github and Hexo. My approach could be applied to create any websites, not just blog. I will also write down some of the problems I met with and the solutions I used during this process, which might be helpful for somebody who visits this website.

Hexo

What is Hexo?

Hexo is a fast, simple and powerful blog framework; it’s also a static site generator. Click hexo website to get more information.

Instalation

We’ll use Hexo to help us create our personal website. It only take a few minutes to set up. Click
